name: Chauncey

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Who are you?{nervously}

topics.topic_text: You first.
topics.response_text: You don't know? <Sighs> Good. That's good. So they didn't send you after me.

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for someone who went missing.
topics.response_text: So was the man I'm supposed to be meeting here. Where is he?

topics.topic_text: Just someone who found a matchbook.
topics.response_text: Matchbook? What about the man I gave it to?

topics.topic_text: He's dead.
topics.response_text: Oh my goodness me! They must know he was talking to someone on the inside.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> He couldn't make it, so he sent me instead.
topics.response_text: {using 'devil' as a curse here}The devil he did. He was supposed to meet me days ago. Are you in Mortimer's employ, then?

topics.topic_text: [Attack] I am now.
topics.response_text: Not for long.

topics.topic_text: Who are you afraid of?
topics.response_text: Mortimer. If he realizes it was me the investigator was planning to meet, he'll have me killed.

topics.topic_text: What were you supposed to discuss here?
topics.response_text: The girl. The one who disappeared. I know what happened to her.

topics.topic_text: So is Mortimer behind the disappearances?
topics.response_text: Yes. The White Glove Society strictly forbids eating humans. But we weren't always the White Glove Society.

topics.topic_text: How do you know what happened to the girl?
topics.response_text: Because I distracted her fiancee while they took her. Well, I'm not proud of it! But I had to. They could see I was having second thoughts.

topics.topic_text: What about Ted Gunderson?
topics.response_text: He's alive, as far as I know. They're trying to keep him fresh. Mortimer has special plans for him.

topics.topic_text: Wouldn't they punish Mortimer for the deception?
topics.response_text: They might. But to him the legacy of returning to the old ways is worth his own life. I don't think he expects it, though. I don't, either.

topics.topic_text: Where are they keeping Ted?
topics.response_text: I don't know exactly. I wasn't in on it. I think some of them have stopped trusting me.

topics.topic_text: Ted's father is a wealthy man. With his resources, this should be easy to stop.
topics.response_text: That may be true, but I wouldn't recommend it. He's built a reputation, and it isn't for calmness and impartiality.

topics.topic_text: Why is everyone around here dressed up and wearing masks?
topics.response_text: Those are all members of the White Glove Society. Our founder, Marjorie, gave us all a dress code. There's only one rule to it.

topics.topic_text: Any suggestions on how to get Ted out?
topics.response_text: Hmm. Well, they'll all be sampling Pre-War wines before the meal. Maybe it's as simple as drugging them.

topics.topic_text: Where is your mask?
topics.response_text: Hmm. Must've forgotten to put it on. How embarrassing.{coy}

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for someone.
topics.response_text: Oh. Well, it's a big hotel. You should talk to Marjorie - she's in charge and she can probably help you find anyone you might need.{First word betrays he's hiding something. Short beat after it as he thinks of what to say.}

topics.topic_text: Let me ask you about something else.
topics.response_text: Go ahead.

conversation.response_text: Let's plan on meeting again as soon as- Wait. Did you hear something? Were you followed?

description:
Chauncey is a 45 year-old African American Male.

A member of the White Glove Society residing at the Ultra-Luxe who serves as an informant within the organization. Chauncey possesses intimate knowledge of the society's activities, including the recent kidnappings on the Strip.

Chauncey's Personality: Chauncey is principled yet conflicted. He objects to Mortimer's cannibalistic practices but remains complicit in the organization's darker activities. He is cautious in his dealings and values his life above all else, which has led him to seek assistance from outsiders.

Chauncey's Backstory: Chauncey was born and raised in the wasteland, eventually joining the White Glove Society. Over the years, he rose through the ranks and gained a position of trust within the organization. However, as Mortimer's leadership became increasingly focused on cannibalism, Chauncey's moral objections grew. Despite his qualms, he remained complicit in the kidnappings that supplied the Ultra-Luxe with its 'special' ingredients. When his disagreements with Mortimer became too public, he fell out of favor and found himself targeted for assassination.
